rut noun
(SEXUALLY ACTIVE PERIOD)
[ S ] the period of the year during which particular male animals, especially deer and sheep, are sexually active: During the rut, stags can be seen fighting for females. in rut
(of particular male animals) sexually excited: The bull elephant seal only puts on this display when in rut.
